com.instil.lgi
Class TreeOptimizer

java.lang.Object
  com.instil.lgi.TreeOptimizer

public final class TreeOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility class that defines the most usual operations performed by a GrammarUtility. This allows for prunning of long branches, branches from a certain type of Block, and empty Blocks.

Author:
Edgar A. Duenez-Guzman
See Also:
GrammarUtility

Method Detail

removeAllOfType

public static void removeAllOfType(Block tree,
                                   int type)
Removes all Blocks of the specified type in the provided tree. This method recursively searches the tree for Blocks of the specified type, removes them, and adds their children to its parent Block.

Parameters:
tree - The root of the tree to modify.
type - The type of Blocks to prune.

removeLeavesOfType

public static void removeLeavesOfType(Block tree,
                                      int type)
Removes all child Blocks of the specified type in the specified tree, provided they have no children on their own. This method recursively searches the tree for leaves of the specified type and removes them.

Parameters:
tree - The root of the tree to modify.
type - The type of Blocks to prune.

removeChildrenOfType

public static void removeChildrenOfType(Block tree,
                                        int type)
Removes all child Blocks of the specified type in the provided tree. This method recursively searches the tree for children of the specified type and removes them.

Parameters:
tree - The root of the tree to modify.
type - The type of Blocks to prune.

collapse

public static void collapse(Block tree)
         Before      After
          _._         _._
         / | \      ./.| \.
       ./  |  \. => /\
       /\ .|       /\
      /\
Collapses long sequences of one-parent/one-child (long branches) starting in the specified tree. The first node to have a number of children different than one will be preserved, and every parent node of which this is its only child will be erased.

Parameters:
tree - The tree to collapse the long branches from.

collapse

public static void collapse(Block tree,
                            int[] types)
         Before      After
          _._         _._
         / | \      ./.| \.
       ./  |  \. => /\
       /\ .|       /\
      /\
Collapses branch sections with only one child each into the first node with none or more than one child. This method copies this non-linear node into the root of the long branch, and all intermediate nodes (including the branch root) are lost. Only nodes of the types specified in the array of integers will be considered for prunning. A Block with only one child but a type not the list will be considered not part of the branch.

Parameters:
tree - The tree to collapse.
types - the types of nodes to collapse, if the node does not have the appropriate type, it will not be collapsed, even if it is a long branch, unless types is set to null, in which case all node types are collapsed.

removeEmpty

public static void removeEmpty(Block tree)
Removes all Blocks in the tree that have no text content associated with them (i.e. getBegin() and getEnd() are equal).

Parameters:
tree - The root of the tree to prune.
